description: MCP server for delegating tasks to specialized AI assistants in Cursor, Claude, and Gemini

AGENTS_DIR.description: Absolute path to the directory containing agent definition files (.md or .txt)

AGENT_TYPE.description: Type of AI CLI to use: 'cursor', 'claude', or 'gemini'

EXECUTION_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Maximum execution time for agents in milliseconds (default: 300000, max: 600000)

SESSION_ENABLED.description: Enable session management to maintain execution history across agent calls (default: false)

SESSION_DIR.description: Directory path for storing session files (default: .mcp-sessions in current working directory)

SESSION_RETENTION_DAYS.description: Number of days to retain session history before automatic cleanup (default: 7)
